constraints.name: adjacent_difference
constraints.description: 二元组 (p, q) 满足 p < q 且 a_p < a_q

constraints.name: overlapping_interval_constraint
constraints.description: 存在两个区间 [l_u, r_u] 和 [l_v, r_v]，使得 l_u ≤ p ≤ r_u 且 l_v ≤ q ≤ r_v

constraints.name: pairwise_exclusion
constraints.description: 区间 [l_j, r_j] 之间不重叠，即 r_j < l_{j+1}

constraints.name: adjacent_difference
constraints.description: 二元组 (p, q) 满足 p < q 且 a_p < a_q

constraints.name: overlapping_interval_constraint
constraints.description: 存在两个区间 [l_u, r_u] 和 [l_v, r_v]，使得 l_u ≤ p ≤ r_u 且 l_v ≤ q ≤ r_v
constraints.formal: ∃ u, v, 1 ≤ u < v ≤ m_i, l_u ≤ p ≤ r_u ∧ l_v ≤ q ≤ r_v

constraints.name: pairwise_exclusion
constraints.description: 区间 [l_j, r_j] 之间不重叠，即 r_j < l_{j+1}

result.description: 统计满足条件的二元组数量

objective.description: 统计满足条件的二元组数量

invariant.name: interval_mergeable

result.name: interval_mergeable
